title: Chairman Naya Pakistan Housing Authority calls on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 27 (APP): Chairman Naya Pakistan Housing Authority Lt. Gen. Â® Anwar Ali Haider called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Thursday.
During the meeting, the Prime Minister was briefed about the progress of ongoing low-cost housing projects under the Naya Pakistan Housing Authority.
The Prime Minister expressed his satisfaction over the progress of low-cost projects especially its positive effects on housing and construction sector.
